SamPy.resolve.misc.fluxCalibrateToSDSS.calibrateToSDSS¶

class SamPy.resolve.misc.fluxCalibrateToSDSS.calibrateToSDSS(configfile, debug, section='DEFAULT')¶

This class can be used to flux calibrate an image slicer 2D spectra to SDSS one (of the same target).

__init__(configfile, debug, section='DEFAULT')¶

Constructor

Methods

__init__(configfile, debug[, section]) Constructor
run() Driver function, runs all the required steps.
